title: Diary of Steve the Noob 16 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: 24,500 words with 47 pictures... Ah, at last, it is done! About time, huh? Sorry this one took so long, but as you can see by the word count and picture count, I got a good excuse. :D Hmm... where did we leave off? It was something important... hmm... Ah! That's right! The enemy army is on the horizon! Read this book today to find out what happens next! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
